name: Sharon Grossman
what_you_do: Sharon Grossman, PhD, is a consultant, speaker, and author who helps businesses leverage stress as a competitive advantage to achieve extraordinary results without burnout.
who_you_serve: She serves organizations and teams looking to improve employee engagement, retain top talent, and enhance workplace productivity.
bio: Best-selling author and experienced psychologist with a background in business.
